characteristic protected by law DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtThis person must be comfortable with both front and backend programming to help build and support proprietary software applications The ideal Java including experience with one or more PHP frameworks eg Laravel Symfony CodeIgniter CakePHP etc Candidate must also be wellgrounded in basic UIUX design principles with a deep understanding of
